TASK: Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft red_wool, I need to craft white_wool first. I need to place 4 strings in the crafting grid to craft white_wool. Therefore, I will move the first string from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
